thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to start by organizing the workspace and checking what files are currently present.
thoughts.reasoning: Before starting any new tasks, it's important to have a clear idea of what's already been done and what files are present in the workspace. This will help me avoid duplicating work and ensure that I'm building on previous progress.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command to see what files are currently present in the workspace
- Create a new directory if necessary to keep things organized
- Move any relevant files into the new directory
- Update the 'README' file to reflect the current state of the workspace
thoughts.criticism: I should have been more organized from the start and kept better track of what files were being generated. I need to make a conscious effort to stay organized going forward.
thoughts.speak: Before starting any new tasks, I will first check what files are currently present in the workspace and organize them if necessary.
